bug.short_desc: Filter model of table should be able to accept column indexes as target

long_desc.thetext:
The filtered data model of table just accepts column id (if set) or column name on his add functions. But normally our behavior is to use column indexes in column related API. Furthermore the documentation is not really clear:
... @param target {String} * The text value of the column to compare against. addBetweenFilter : function(filter, value1, value2, target) ...
It means the column id or even the column name, but without a look at the code, I couldn't determine what it means really.
It would be nice to extend the add... functions of the model to accept column indexes as well. And of course improving of the documentation would be helpful.
